The '''Frostmoon Scions,''' also known as '''Moonchildren''', are an organization from [[Snezhnaya]].

The Frostmoon Scions worship the "[[Aria, Sonnet and Canon|Moon Goddess]]" and had abandoned their ancient [[Hyperborea|golden civilization]], finding new homes among the mountains and forests in [[Nod-Krai]]. They appear in an area known as [[Hiisi Island]].<ref>[[Song of the Welkin Moon]]</ref> According to [[Helka]], they are completely unlike the people of [[Nasha Town]], and they have created statues all over Nod-Krai.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Helka}}</ref>

A priestess of the Frostmoon Scions was involved in helping the first [[Torchforger]] banish [[the Wild Hunt]] with Frostmoon light in ancient times, thus establishing the [[Lightkeepers]].<ref name=Pledge>{{Ref/Arti|Lightkeeper's Pledge}}</ref>
